sentence.Network_en: These are men whose hearts are aligned to Wall Street stoniness rather than Mancunian sentimentality.
sentence.Network_cn: 格拉泽一家的心像华尔街般冷漠而不是像曼彻斯特人一样感情丰富.

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to or characteristic of the English city of Manchester or its residents;
